By Zinzy Waleson Geene, last updated on November 22, 2022

The tagline of Heardle should be: â€œwow, though, music, huh?â€

I was introduced to Heardle by Anja, who it from The Roxane Gay Agenda. If youâ€™re not familiar with it, Heardle is a web-based game that allots a player six attempts to guess a song. Itâ€™s Wordle for music. Iâ€™ve been playing Heardle since the day I met it. I currently hold a 75% success rate. Iâ€™m not strong on pop music from the past five years.

What I find utterly endearing about Heardle, is that itâ€™s not a game. Heardle is an ode to music.

Zinzy Waleson Geene (she/ they) is a researcher, designer, and queer facilitator from Amsterdam. She's interested in humanities and behavioral sciences, yoga practice, and amateur cooking. She engages in mellow cultural and critical analysis, linking and tinkering on her personal website, zinzy.website .
